# Request for Proposal: Mechanical Maintenance Services for RCMP Yorkton Rural Detachment

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** M5000-21-02837/B
* **Reference Number:** CB-7835-93216338
* **Publication Date:** August 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 23, 2023, 16:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** August 23, 2023

## Contract Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking Mechanical Maintenance Services for the RCMP Yorkton Rural Detachment in Yorkton, Saskatchewan. The contract period is expected to be 24 months with an optional extension for two additional 12-month periods.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria are outlined in the attached tender documents. Suppliers must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be considered responsive.

## Security Requirement

The solicitation requires a security clearance.

## Tender Requirements

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per the instructions in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

## Indigenous Procurement

The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this procurement process. Suppliers can increase their visibility and competitiveness by registering in the Federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD).

## Contact Information

* Name: Shawn Balaski
* Email: [shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (780) 670-8592
* Fax: None

## Attachments

The following documents are attached:
* Annex E - List of Names for Integrity Verification Form (English and French)
* RFP - Request for Proposal (English and French)
* Annex C - SRCL-2020-111628 (English and French)

## Important Notes

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
